title: Sister Guliema Praying to Saints Aimo and Vermondo on Behalf of her Sick Sister, Maria, the Wife of Andreas de Confalonieri of Milan
description: Sister Guliema Praying to Saints Aimo and Vermondo on Behalf of her Sick Sister, Maria, the Wife of Andreas de Confalonieri of Milan; Attributed to Anovelo da Imbonate (Italian (Lombard), active about 1400); Milan, Lombardia, Italy; about 1400; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 25.6 x 18.4 cm (10 1/16 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. 26, fol. 7v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
